page.title: 14A FAMOUS PERSON
page.content: he has been on tv recently. He has joined up with someone called Peter Blegplant to make a record but I do not know what it was called.If the group is doing something and they get an invatation to play with another group they do not go in for it because the group comes first. we asked him how famous he would like to be and he said as famous as possible. His longest tour was 10 weeks which was in America in 1979.He went to Yugaslavia a bit shorter than 10 weeks. His last concert was in 1982 but he is still playing and making records.The last N0.1 he had was in New Zealand just before he left.
